entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
